channel.title: Women in Tech on DataWoman
channel.description: Recent content in Women in Tech on DataWoman

item.title: The Complicated Emotional Life of a Woman in Tech
item.description: I am lucky. My story is not the one that we’re hearing over and over in the news, about a woman being manipulated and traumatized by men. This story is about everything else - my internal experience of being female amongst men. Early in my life as a student and 20-something professional, gender never seemed to matter. The issues of my mother’s generation in which women had to fight for respect in fields other than teaching or nursing seemed to be over.
